td.content: s:F retired aged 71 yrs presents with Neurological for 9 days. she has a history of Seizures for past 3 years. o:Height 67 in, Weight 129 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 68, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16 a:Seizures p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed oxcarbazepine - 300 mg daily, and ordered Electroencephalogram.

s:a 72 year old white female retired presents with Neurological for 5 weeks. she has a history of Seizures for past 3 years. o:Height 66 in, Weight 127 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 14 a:Seizures p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to neurology.

s:a 72 yo f presents with Neurological of 6 weeks duration. o:Height 67 in, Weight 130 lbs, Temperature 99.1 F, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 15 a:Seizures p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed phenobarbitol - 50 mg 2-3 x per day.
